hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Small Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Stone of Agony# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Bottom of the Well#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Hover Boots#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Heart Container#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Zora Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.
